snippet: Elda M. Kriss was evicted from her room and all of her belongings, including her green card, were thrown out while she was hospitalized. Now she’s settling into a place of her own.
abstract: Elda M Kriss of Brooklyn was helped by Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens when she sought to replace her lost green card and was also given other assistance after being evicted from her previous apartment; Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens is one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Elda M. Kriss was evicted from her room and all of her belongings, including her green card, were thrown out while she was hospitalized. Now she’s settling into a place of her own.

headline.print_headline: Replacing a Green Card, and a Home, After an Eviction
headline.main: Replacing a Green Card, and a Home

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
